description.zh: 依據提供服務準則,工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康,安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹製造流程編排、可程式控制系統、資料傳輸及局部迴路系統、數值控制、數值控制編程、工業機器人、人工智慧、整合製造系統（CIM）。
description.en: Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Integrated and Manufacturing System.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD. 2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, and solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4) 射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用； (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

description.zh: 以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。概念性的介紹精密機電系統以及精密加工程序，工件精密度介紹，誤差與公差(尺寸精度、組裝誤差)，移動平台(XY-Stage)之選用，滾珠螺桿與線性滑軌選用與承重計算，真直度與平行度介紹，位置控制與馬達選用。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the concepts of precision mechanical systems and precision fabrication process. The concepts of mechanical errors and tolerance of products and the key points of selecting of XY-stages, driving units, ball screws, and linear motion elements will be also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則,工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康,安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 論述電磁干擾之物理模式與耦合機制。探討各種抗干擾之電磁相容設計實務，其中包括：接地、濾波、瞬態抑制與保護電路、屏蔽、信號互連、積體電路應用防止雜訊措施、印刷電路板抗干擾佈局設計、靜電放電保護等。介紹電磁干擾標準與量測方法。
description.en: Discuss the physical model of electromagnetic interference (EMI) and coupling mechanism. Deal with a variety of design methods for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) which includes : Grounding, Filtering, Transient suppression and protection, Shielding, Signal interconnection, Prevents noise in IC applications, PCB layout design rules against interference, Electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection, etc. Introduce the EMI standards and measurement techniques.

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意．肇事之形成因素，重建之定義及過程，數學物理及動力學應用於肇事重建，了解車輛碰撞行為，肇事之理解認知及反應，肇事之動量功能原理應用．車速估算．及轉向過度修正，轎車．機車．行人．及卡車肇事重建．
description.en: Causes & Contributing Factor in traffic accident, Process of Traffic Accidetn Reconstruction, Apply Math. Physics and Dynamics in Traffic Accident Reconstruction., Understanding Vehicle Collision Behavior, Perception & Reaction in Traffic Accident, Principle of Momnetum、 Work and Energy、 Speed Estimates for Vehicle, Steering Over-correction in Traffic Accident, Vehicle-Pedestrian, Motorcycle and Heavy Truck Traffic Accident Reconstruction。

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 進階冰水主機實習、進階冷凍工程實習、進階中央空調系統實習、空調設備工程品質管理實務、進階空調工程實習。
description.en: Advanced practices and experiments of water chiller unit, refrigeration engineering, central air conditioning system, quality control of air conditioning facilities, and air conditioning engineering.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

name.zh: 機械工程概論及實驗(二)

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en: (A) Thermal Lab. Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. (B) Fluid Mechanics Lab. Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 自動化機械之機構、感測器與驅動器介面技術、可程式控制程式設計及應用、作實際自動化機械之模擬、分析及設計專題。
description.en: Mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , PLC, and case study.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。電路元件、直流電路、交流電路、電磁感應、直流電機、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、特殊電機、電工儀表、電工法規。
description.en: ME113 Introduction to Electrical Engineering (3-0-3)Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor Circuit Components, DC Circuit, AC Circuit, Electro-magnet Induction,DC Electric Machines, Transformers, Three-Phase AC, Three-Phase Induction Motors, Single-Phase Induction Motors, Synchronous Motors,Special Electric Machines, And Electrical Instrument and Meters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, chain drives, belt drives, friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 1.時變電磁場之介紹;2.平面電磁波;3.傳輸線之理論及應用;4.導波管與共振腔;5.天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: １.數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２.插值及多項式３.數值積分與微４.數值線性代數５.非線性方程式之解６.曲線配合與函數近似７.近似解理論８.常微分方程式的數值解法９.偏微分方程式的數值解法
description.en: 1.Preliminary of Numerical Solutions2.Interpolations and Polynomials3.Numerical Differentiation and Integratin 4.Numerical Linear Algebra5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems6.Curve Fitting and cubic spline Interpolation 7.Approximation Theory8.Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations9.Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en: 1.Frequency response 2.Feedback amplifier3.Stability analysis4.Operational amplifier5.Waveform generators and shaping 6.Filter7.Power amplifier

description.zh: 內容包函：(1)串級放大電路; (2)場效電晶體之特性; (3)場效電晶體放大電路; (4)運算放大器應用電路(反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5)基本振盪電路(RC振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6)高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應; (7)回授放大器; (8)放大器之穩定性實驗; (9)振盪器設計; (10)主動濾波器; (11)功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程係針對大學生授課標準研擬有關個人及企業投資及財務之管理。本課程之目的在使學生瞭解如何使相關之投資獲得良好報酬，介紹企業財務結構。企業資金分配情形。企業如何籌措資金及相關財務理論之應用。本課程研究內容包括：財務市場結構、利息因子、財務規畫及分析、股票、債券、租借問題、資金預算分配及風險性、長期借貸、有價證券等。
description.en: This course includes modern theory of business finance with emphasis on analytical and quantitative skills, treatment of firm's investment financing, dividend decisions in a valuation framework, survey of related empirical work, net present value, portfolio theory, capital asset pricing model, efficient capital markets, option theory, and effect of inflation.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組，凸輪，齒輪，純滾動系統，鏈輪，皮帶，滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Introduction of the principles which all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members． Examples include linkages, Cams, Gears, Pure rolling system, Chain drives, Belt drives, Friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402025或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
description.en: Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD. 2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, and solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的製程及功能，並探討材料的性質與材料組成原子的電子組態、原子間之化學鍵結、及晶體結構間的關係。本課程涵蓋了下列內容：1.原子的電子組態及原子間之化學鍵結，2.晶體結構，3.晶體缺陷與固體中的擴散，4.相圖與相變化，5.金屬材料及工程合金，6.陶瓷材料的結構、性質、製程與應用，7.高分子材料的結構、性質、應用與加工，8.複合材料，9.材料之機械性質，10.材料之電性質，11.材料之熱性質，12.材料之磁性質，13.材料之光學性質，14.材料的腐蝕與蛻化，15.半導體材料、生醫材料、先進材料、智慧型材料及奈米科技，16.材料與環境的相互影響，17.材料的選擇與設計考量。
description.en: This course introduces the fabrication and performance of various materials as well as the relationships that exist between the chemical bonding, structures and properties of materials.It covers the following topics: Atomic Structures and Interatomic Bonding; Structure of Crystalline Solids; Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids; Phase Diagrams and Phase Transformations; Applications and Processing of Metal and Alloys; Structures, Properties, Applications and Processing of Ceramics; Structures, Characteristics, Applications and Processing of Polymers; Composites; Mechanical Properties of Materials; Electrical Properties of Materials; Thermal Properties of Materials; Magnetic Properties of Materials; Optical Properties of Materials; Corrosion and Degradation of Materials; Semiconductors, Biomaterials, Advanced Materials, Smart Materials and Nanotechnology; Environmental Issues in Materials Science and Engineering; Materials Selection and Design Considerations.

description.zh: 應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 使同學進一步獲得土壤力學之重要觀念與理論，授課內容含粘土礦物、滲透與滲流、土壤內之應力分析、壓密理論與沈陷分析、剪力強度應力軌跡與土壤之側向土壓力、邊坡穩定分析。
description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。
邊坡破壞之型態、分類、誘因與力學行為之探討，邊坡穩定分析之方法與理論，邊坡穩定處理對策略與防治方法之探討，邊坡滑動地層之監測、鑽探取樣與試驗分析。
description.en: This course covers various methods of slope stability analyses; selection of methods of analysis and strength parameters;field investigation for landslide problems; design strategies; landslip preventive and protective measures; and slope monitoring systems.

description.zh: 概述內容最多各為1000Bytes給水及污水工程介紹自來水及汙水工程及其操作系統所需之原理、設計工具。其主要應用到流體力學、水文學、水處理及相關之設計及計算。主要的議題包含水質參數、地表水及地下水處理、自來水處理過程、汙染物移除、管網設計、汙水處理、生物處理、下水道建設、自來水及下水道操作及維護。
description.en: The Water Supply and Sewerage provides students with engineering principles and tools for designing and operating water and sewerage systems. It facilitates application of knowledge acquired in fluid mechanics, hydrology, water quality, design and computing. Key topics include water quality parameters; groundwater and surface water treatment; water treatment process technologies; nutrient removal; simplified sewerage; decentralised water and sanitation systems; biosolids management; and operation and maintenance of water supply and sanitation infrastructure.

description.zh: 課程內容涵蓋鋼結構設計之原則及理念,設計方法之觀念與理論,鋼結構之型式及材料,拉力構件,壓力構件,梁,梁柱,接合之設計。
description.en: The contents of the course include concepts and design philosophies in structural steel design, analysis and design of tension members, compression members, flexural members, beam-columns, and bolted and welded connections.

description.zh: 1.光纖概論，2.光纖波導，3.光纖傳輸特特性，4.光纖與光纜，5.光纖連接，6.光源與檢光器，7.光纖系統，8.光纖量測，9.光纖應用與未來發展。
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Waveguide of optical fibers3.Propagation in optical fibers4.Optical fibers and opotical cable5.Fiber connectors6.Light sources and detectors7.Optical fiber communication systems8.Measurement of optical fiber communication systems9.Applications

description.zh: 論述電磁干擾之物理模式與耦合機制。探討各種抗干擾之電磁相容設計實務，其中包括：接地、濾波、瞬態抑制與保護電路、屏蔽、信號互連、積體電路應用防止雜訊措施、印刷電路板抗干擾佈局設計、靜電放電保護等。介紹電磁干擾標準與量測方法。
description.en: Discuss the physical model of electromagnetic interference (EMI) and coupling mechanism. Deal with a variety of design methods for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) which includes : Grounding, Filtering, Transient suppression and protection, Shielding, Signal interconnection, Prevents noise in IC applications, PCB layout design rules against interference, Electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection, etc. Introduce the EMI standards and measurement techniques.

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

name.zh: 軟體定義網路架構與應用服務

description.zh: 介紹SDN網路與現今網路架構、並說明其主要應用諸如雲端運算應用虛擬網路應用、虛擬儲存應用、集成解決方案及資料中心整合SDN。
description.en: To introduce the architecture of software-defined networking and hardware-defined networking and outline SDN applications such as Cloud computing application、Virtual networking 、Virtual storage 、Aggregation solution and SDN- integrated Data center 。

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 由於科技進步，交通發達，縮短了各區域間之距離，製造業面臨了許多衝擊，因此如何在全球市場上佔有一席之地是現代經營與管理者必須思考的。本課程主要是整合市場機能、顧客導向、行銷企畫、生產製造、研究發展、人力資源、社會責任、工業安全及環境保護等領域，其重點涵蓋：如何架構企業組織，使其製造生產的產品能滿足市場需求、如何結合市場機能與製造功能，使企業永續經營、如何生產產品，使其具有市場競爭力、探討產品成功之關鍵點，使競爭策略具體化、探討新的思考方式以發展出具有競爭性的策略。
description.en: This course is dedicated to integrate the marketing functions, customer orientation, market planning, production, R&D, human resources, community responsibilities, industrial safety and environmental protection.  Its emphasis includes development of corporate organization, integration of market and manufacturing functions, production of goods, discover of product CSF and discussion of new thinking approaches.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 探討投資管理的基本概念。內容有:實質資產、金融資產、金融市場、金融工具、經濟分析、產業分析、個別公司分析、基本分析、技術分析、投資報酬與風險、投資組合管理。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of investment management, including real assets, financial assets, financial markets, financial instrument, industrial analysis, corporate analysis, investment return and risk, portfolio management.

description.zh: 從企業經理人的觀點來操討談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對談判佑識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對中國傳統文化所孕育的建築表現，使學生認識傳統的文化涵構與建築之關係及其構造方法，其主要授課內容如下：1.思想及文化背景：以周易及禮制為起點，以至儒道二家思想，引申至象徵主義或文字學等對建築之影響。2.類型討論：探討住宅、宮殿、寺廟、衙門、城、橋、塔、墳等設計思想與原則。3.建築主題：瞭解建築平面發展之原理、立面設計與台觀處理之原則及象徵主義思想對平面規劃、布局及立面裝修之影響。4.園林建築：以江南園林及北方大型園林為例，探討其布局、園屋、疊山、理水等相關規劃原則。5.建築構造：瞭解土木構造的基本設計原則與構造方法，進而討論裝修彩畫等細部特徵。
description.en: It is an introductory course to history of Chinese architecture. The purpose is to raising students' awareness of traditional culture for further concern of our environment. It will focus on the following themes:(1) Thought and Culture. (2) Architectural type. (3) Architectural characters. (4) Garden architecture. (5) Structure and Construction.

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.1.	Temporary work 2.	Safety measure work 3.	Earthwork4.	Concrete work5.	Mold work6.	Reinforcement work7.	Partition work8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work9.	Miscellaneous work

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解一般都市計畫的主要內容，同時針對台灣現行都市計畫的有關組織體系、實務作業與現況問題作有系統的探討。授課主題涵蓋：1.台灣空間規劃的階層體系、2.都市計畫組織體系與功能、3.台灣都市計畫的發展沿革、4.都市規劃的程序、內容與方法、5.規劃資料的搜集、調查與分析、6.土地使用計畫、7.交通計畫、8.公共設施計畫、9.都市更新、10.都市計畫未來的發展趨勢、11.實際案例分析、研討。

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.學會建築設計作品的首頁建構與網路基本應用的操作。3.學習建築設計影像處理技術。授課內容主題包括：電腦輔助建築繪圖與網路應用表現，個人Homepage設計，設計作品網頁表現，建築專業影像處理與環境影像改造，平面動態影像處理技術，建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.	We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.	We learn how to create homepage of architectural design in www.3.	We learn the image process analysis in architectural environment.The contents of this class is included about: the presentation of computer-aided architectural design and application in www, personal homepage design and personal design work's presentation, professional image process analysis in architectural environment, animation of 2D image process and application, introduction and application of professional soft of computer-a

description.zh: 本課程主要是在教導學生了解力學之概念與分析方法，使其具備學習結構學之基礎能力，其主要授課內容包括：1.力學之基本概念及平衡條件、2.構材之斷面性質如形心、重心、面積一次矩、慣性矩及其應用、3.結構構材承受軸向載重、扭力、彎矩之分析及設計應用、4.應力及應變之關係、5.梁之變形，柱之性質以及各種分析理論。
description.en: This course introduced the concept of mechanics and provided the principles of structural analysis, the course consists of(1) Equations of equilibrium(2) Frame Section Properties (3) Shear and moment diagrams (4) Relationships of stress and strainDeflection of beams and Column characteristics

description.zh: 本課程之目的在使同學對財務管理之專業知識產生一概略的認識，期望同學能瞭解資金之運用、籌措及管理之一些觀念及技巧，並做為未來進行相關財務決策或進一步研究財務理論之基礎。本課程會將攸關財務的主題加以介紹,包含：1.財務報表分析2.時間價值，債券與股票3.投資決策與折現分析4.風險、報酬與資金成本5.公司融資政策6.資本結構與股利政策7.財務規畫8.合併與購併9.風險管理
description.en: This purpose of this course is to help undergraduate students to understand the basic concept and issues in corporate finance.This course will focus on basic issues in corporate finance, such as:1.	Financial Statement Analysis 2.	Valuing Bonds and Stocks3.	Capital Budgeting Decisions4.	Risk, Return, and Cost of Capital5.	Corporate Financing Decisions6.	Capital Structure and Dividend Policy7.	Financial Planning8.	Mergers and Acquisitions9.	Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is introduce that how to use resource about inside of Business and staff. It's including ability, knowledge, technology, attitude and encourage. To harmony with tactics and form of entirety business. The context of course have Human Resources Analysis, tactics and goal, support to operating about how to get, developing, rewards, and maintain of human resources.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。課程涵蓋之主題為：（1）管理諮詢的目的和範圍，（2）顧問師的職責和角色，（3）諮詢過程，（4）計畫書的擬定與合約的草擬，（5）訪談與展示的技巧，及（6）手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應證在本課程所學得的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

name.en: An Analysis of the Market in China and the ASEAN

description.zh: 市場分析是現代經營管理人才不可缺少的分析技術，亦是現代企業制定行銷策略與經營管理之重要依據。面對崛起的中國及東協市場經濟動能，全球爭先恐後分食商機，台灣企業更需掌握優勢積極佈局。本課程旨在於教導學生如何運用科學方法分析中國大陸及東協市場之特點及運行規律。由個體角度探討中國及東協國家生產者與消費者從事市場活動之行為模式，從總體方面探討企業在中國及東協國家特殊政治、經濟、社會、文化情勢下所面臨的潛在機會與挑戰。本課程除介紹市場分析之基本方法，亦將搭配個案分析，藉由跨國企業在中國及東協市場成功之發展策略反觀市場之重要特色。
description.en: The course of Market Analysis is a necessary skill for people who are engaged in modern business management. It is also the important basis by which an enterprise makes its marketing strategy and operates the business. China and the ASEAN market economic are increasing. Taiwan companies need to grasp and adjustment the advantages. The objective of this course is to guide students to analyses the characteristics and rules in China and the ASEAN market by scientific methods. In microscopic way, we research the economic behavior of producers and consumers in China and the ASEAN market. In macroscopic way, we discuss the potential chances and challenges the enterprises need to face. This course not only introduces fundamental way to analyses China and the ASEAN market, but also adopts case study to prove the results concluded from the analysis.

description.zh: 以整合行銷傳播為基礎，分析產品之廣告與推廣組合機會，進而發展全傳播之策略與企劃，意圖培養學生邏輯思考、資料判讀、廣告企劃分析之能力，亦包括各種產業之企劃工作。
description.en: The topics include: Advertising Media, Integrated Marketing Communication, Media planning, and Advertising Effectiveness.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。電路元件、直流電路、交流電路、電磁感應、直流電機、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、特殊電機、電工儀表、電工法規。
description.en: ME113 Introduction to Electrical Engineering (3-0-3)Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor Circuit Components, DC Circuit, AC Circuit, Electro-magnet Induction,DC Electric Machines, Transformers, Three-Phase AC, Three-Phase Induction Motors, Single-Phase Induction Motors, Synchronous Motors,Special Electric Machines, And Electrical Instrument and Meters.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the principles that all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members. Examples include linkages, cams, gears, pure rolling systems, chain drives, belt drives, friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。電路元件、直流電路、交流電路、電磁感應、直流電機、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、特殊電機、電工儀表、電工法規。
description.en: ME113 Introduction to Electrical Engineering (3-0-3)Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor Circuit Components, DC Circuit, AC Circuit, Electro-magnet Induction,DC Electric Machines, Transformers, Three-Phase AC, Three-Phase Induction Motors, Single-Phase Induction Motors, Synchronous Motors,Special Electric Machines, And Electrical Instrument and Meters.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

notes: 綜科館501室 賴瑛姿老師

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 1.通訊工程簡介2.調幅與調頻3.傳輸與接收系統4.衛星通訊簡介5.數據通訊簡介6.光纖通訊簡介7.電話系統簡介8.行動通訊簡介
description.en: 1.Introductions2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers4.Introduction to Satellite Communications5.Introduction to Data Communications6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications7.Introduction to Telephone System8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

notes: 與訓四機三乙 合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 講解建築計畫的基本精神、方法及各種類型建築的案例分析其授課主題為：一、建築計畫之基本精神：1.計劃和生活、生產的關係、2.建築計畫之定位；二、建築計畫之方法：1.建築之定性、2.計畫之調查、分析、3.尺寸與規模計畫、4.空間與構造計畫；三、案例分析。
description.en: Introduce the basic philosophy & method of architecture planning. Case studies ofdifferent building types. The topic include：1、	the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living l	the scope of architecture planning 2、	the method of architecture planningl	the quality of architecturel	the investigation & analysis of planningl	size & scale planningl	space & construction planning 3、	case study

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

description.zh: 授課內容為：1.基本線條及圖形練習、2.建築元素及符號之認識、3.建築圖面繪製(平、立、剖面、透視、大樣)、4.基本建築圖面表現法練習、授課方式包括相關知識講解與隨堂操作練習、製圖成張來達、標準者須反覆練習至合格為止。
description.en: 1.	Basic graphic tramning.2.	Symbols of building elements.3.	Design drawing with plan, elevation, section, detail and isometric presentation.

description.zh: 一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

description.zh: 本課程在培養學生具備在建築專業設計時輔助其執行外部環境塑造的基本能力與認知。主要教學內容包括：一、景觀建築之基礎專業概說與相關範疇之界定：1.景觀建築專業之界定、範疇、演變、2.景觀建築之相關範疇之界定生態學、園藝學；二、景觀建築之人文背景：1.景觀建築之風格演變、2.景觀建築之人文因子概說；三、景觀建築之研究方法與內涵：1.景觀建築之定性研究方法解析、2.景觀建築之定量研究方法解析。
description.en: The course aims at the training of undertaking design for outdoor environment within architectural discipline. Contents of the course mainly includes:1.	Definition of landscape architecture and the relevant categories.1)	Definition, realm, and development in landscape profession2)	Defining relevant disciplines such as horticulture, ecology, and architecture. 2.	Human aspects  1)	The transformation of landscape modes and styles2)	Human factors 3.	Landscape Research Methods 1)	Qualitative Research in landscape 2)	Quantitative Research in landscape

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。
description.en: Text, image, audio, video are common used to transmit information now. How to organize and represent these different kinds of data became an important issue. This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.
