description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、工業管理應用程式實例簡介。
description.en: This course is consists of: computer hardware structure, computer operation systems, computer software systems, basic programming language and applications, data process, file management, database management systems, applied package, and the applications of these Knowledge in IE.

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

name.en: Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規畫、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD 繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確 表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美 的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表 達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 研究光的特質，了解攝影的原理，利用攝影的器材、設備、透過攝影的技法，表現攝影的藝術價值，達到攝影創作的目的。
description.en: This course makes students familiar with the nature of light, the principles and the techniques of photography. Through the practice of equipments and tools of photography, the students can learn how to create and express the artistic value of photography.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.zh: 介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要使學生能強化會計學的基本觀念，並以國際會計原則(IFRS)為架構，熟悉會計流程與財務報表之編製。課程內容包含會計恆等式與財務報表的介紹、借貸法則、會計處理程序(分錄、過帳、試算)與調整、結帳與會計循環的完成、買賣業會計、存貨的會計處理、現金、應收帳款、不動產、廠房與設備、無形資產、負債、股東權益、以及投資活動的會計處理，最後則是現金流量表的編制，與財務報表的運用與分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the basic concepts and standards underlying financial accounting systems. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: cash, accounts and notes receivable, inventory, marketable securities, equity investments, PPE, intangibles, debt, equity issuance, and dividends. The course emphasizes the construction of the basic financial accounting statements - the income statement, retained earnings statement, statement of financial position, and statement of cash flows - as well as their interpretation. Financial accounting focuses on providing information that is relevant and useful for external users. This course expands your knowledge of understanding of the basic language and conceptions of accounting. The basic accounting concepts that will help you solve problems and exercises designed to transaction recording and financial statement preparation.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

name.zh: 企劃與技術報告製作與簡報技巧

description.zh: 發展研發工程人員的企畫報告製作能力與簡報技巧，提升專業能力與價值。
description.en: Developing R & D engineers’ skills of proposal and presentation, to enhance the professional techniques self-value.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹美國專利制度與美國專利法。由於美國為案例法國家，故除介紹美國專利法之35 U.S.C. §§101-103 and §112等重要法規外，並以相關case law說明美國專利法的實質內涵與精神。修習本課程之學生，於逐步學習到閱讀法律英文之方法後，期於完成本課程時，具有獨力閱讀美國專利案例之能力。
description.en: This course will introduce the U.S. Patent Act and cases, including 35 U.S.C. §101-103, 112, as well as the patent system. Students are expected to read assignments before the class, so that they can answer questions and join discussions in class. Students are expected to learn how to read legal English durning the course and able to read patent cases on their own.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (I)

description.zh: 本課程上學期將以智慧財產局頒佈之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程式後實體」原則先就「程式審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 先修課程︰熱傳學本課程主要針對冷凍系統隔熱與熱傳技術作更深入探討，學生以修習過大學部" 熱傳學" 三學分之課程，本課程主要闡述︰1. 熱傳導理論2. 隔熱材料性質3. 真空保溫技術4. 真空保溫材料性質5. 冷凍系統隔熱設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of insulation technology for a refrigeration system.The course includes the following subjects:1. Theory of heat conduction 2. The property of insulation materials3. Outline of vacuum insulation technology  4. The property of vacuum insulation materials5. Design of insulation for refrigeration systems.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

notes: 博碩課程, 日夜合開各限12人, 共同411室

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於透過講課、個案研討、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資方案的定義、投資報酬與風險之分析、投資決策之擬訂。主要包括以下課題：投資專案評估方法與決策程序、利率及通膨率對投資的影響、資產折舊與設備更新、資金預算分配、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、公司基本營運分析、技術分析、股價與投資組合分析、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objectives of this course focus on the definition of the investment projects, investment return and risk analysis, and investment decision making. The course contents are given through lectures, case study and term project presentation. The topics of this course includes: investment project analysis and decision process, the effect of interest and inflation to investment return, asset depreciation and replacement problems, capital budgeting, risk and uncertainty of project investment, real options, basic and technical analysis of corporation, stock price analysis and portfolio analysis, case studies of business and engineering investments. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

description.zh: 先修課程：工業電子學或負責教授同意。各種工業用感測器及設施自動化感測器結構、特性及工作原理，各種感測器之測量系統及界面電路設計，監控系統及感測器應用設計。
通訊系統簡介，類比調變技術（AM，FM），脈波調變技術，數位調變技術。

description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 負責教授同意。介紹現代化的電腦整合製造系統及機械製造工程師的主要任務－工作準備、製造、安裝及檢驗。同時，簡介機械製造工程師必備的知識：如重要的工程材料；機械加工重要程序之原理，包括材料成形，變形，去除，連接及表面處理等技術；工作機械之構造及其控制技術（機械式、油壓式及數值控制）；自動化生產系統；量測技術及品管。
description.en: Introduction to Modern Computer Integrated Manufacturing System and Manufacturing Planning, Manufacturing Operation, Assembly and Inspection. Meanwhile, discuss the essential knowledge of manufacturing engineer, Engineering Materials, Principles of Manufacturing Process, as Casting, Forming, Material-Removing, Joining and Surface Technology, Machine Tool Structures and its control Technologies, Automatic Production Systems, Metrology and Quality Control.

description.zh: 資訊科技不斷進步，數位化應用從生活到工作上都變得不可或缺，也是奠定個人與企業競爭力的基礎。本課程旨在探討企業面臨產業競爭、轉型數位型企業時之議題、如何轉型及其營運模式之規畫等議題。除外相關個案之研討含教學個案及實際產業個案亦包含本課程中。
description.en: Information technology continues to progress, digital applications from life to work have become indispensable, but also lay the foundation for personal and business competitiveness. This course aims to explore issues such as the challenges of industrial competition, the transformation of digital enterprises, how to transform and its business model. Examples of related cases and industrial cases are included in this course.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 本課程旨於培訓職場專業英文教學師資, 以因應在未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之趨勢。在一般普通英文教師需求已近飽合的現況且對專業英文教學的新需求潮流下,建構新的專業用途英語教學內容及方法為本課程之宗旨及目標。本所應用語言組課程之主軸為以應用語言學為導向之專業英語研究及應用的人才,除培養專業英文應用能力以期研究所畢業生在業界專業領域中以優勢英語文能力為基礎,厚植專業發展潛能。而針對未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之需求,以專業英文研究為基礎輔以強化ESP課程設計及課堂教學法，方能成功轉換普通英文教師角色至ESP/EPP教學。畢業生未來可於大學,政府部門,私人企業,及專門提供專業英文教學機構中,從事專業英文職前及在職英文訓練教師。
description.en: When it comes to ESL/EFL teaching and learning, traditional teaching methodology has its major emphasis on theories of teaching and learning general English.  Methods and approaches in the ESL/EFL classrooms, material implementation, course design and assessment do not meet the demands in the fast-growing market for function-specific professional English teaching personnel. While the pedagogical courses acknowledges the importance and necessity of preparing students with the ESL / EFL teaching basics, it is particularly our mission to expand the ESL /EFL horizon into a new realm of ESP/EPP-specific teaching contexts with the necessary tools, resources, and techniques in implementing ESP/ EPP courses. Quarrying out knowledge from both English pedagogy and ESP / EPP theories and applications, students are prepared to establish the tailor-developed ESP / EPP programs for specific industries and corporations for pre-career training and in-job trainings as well. From diagnostic needs analys

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程期望在有限時間內對高層建築中較重要且特有的工種，如：剛構造施工、帷幕強工程、防火披覆工程、高層營建管理等加以介紹
description.en: This course purpose to introduce special and important construction method in Construction of High-Rise Building which involves Steel Structural Engineering, Curtain Wall Engineering, Fireproofing Engineering and Construction Management of High-Rise Building, etc.

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

notes: 四建四與創意四、職二建五合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生坡地開發建設所需具備之相關知識，課程的內容主要的是承續坡地計畫的相關主題，但以從事實務工作所需之內容為主。授課主題涵蓋：1.基地調查與分析（包括自然與生態環境）2.基地開發之工程 3.基地開發之成本分析 4.環境影響評估 5.基地開發之相關法規 6.案例分析。
description.en: The course is intended to train the students to be able to establish a safe and high-quality hillside buildings. The primary contents include(1) influential factors of hillside environment, (2) planning and design stage strategic,(3) construction process, (4) maintenance works, and (5) regulation

notes: 四建四與創意四、職二建五合開

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分（上學期土地利用法規、下學期不動產投資法規），上學期旨在介紹與土地開發及利用有關之上位法規，包括法規基本架構、國土計畫體系、區域計畫體系、都市計畫體系、土地開發體系及都市更新體系等相關法規外，並輔以實際案例探討，以加強同學對土地利用法規之認識與應用，並有助要準備建築師專技高考及不動產相關考試(地政士、不動產經紀人、不動產估價師)之同學應考並取得專業證照。
description.en: The course is divided into two parts (the term land use regulations, under the term real estate investment regulation), the term is intended to introduce and land development and use of relevant laws and regulations of the host, including regulatory basic architecture, land planning system, the regional planning system, outside the urban planning system, land development and urban renewal system and other system-related laws and regulations, supplemented by practical examples discussed in order to strengthen the students understanding of the land use regulations and applications, and help to prepare architect designed and Real Estate related technical college entrance exam (Lands disabilities, real estate agents, real estate appraisers) of the students sit and obtain professional licenses.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 探討家具發展之歷程，主要設計風格之嬗變。內容含蓋起源及影響，構造特色，裝飾方法，設計語彙，家具與其相關環境之意義，以及影響風格表現差異之原因分析等主要課題。
description.en: A survey of major periods and stylistic development of furniture from ancient world to the present. The origins and influences, construction techniques, methods of decoration, the vocabulary and significance of furniture and its related environments, an analysis of the reasons for differences in manner of expression are the major themes discussed in the course.
